subject: Re: [junit] Is it possible to mix junit4 tests with legacy junit3 	tests
msgSnippet: What you can do is mix JUnit4 and JUnit3 test classes in a single test suite. You can t mix JUnit3 and JUnit4 test methods in a single class. To mix JUnit3
messageBody:
What you can do is mix JUnit4 and JUnit3 test classes in a single test
suite. You can't mix JUnit3 and JUnit4 test methods in a single class.
To mix JUnit3 test classes with JUnit4 test classes you need to wrap the
JUnit3 test classes or test suite in a JUnit4TestAdapter, I think.
I only run my test with Eclipse or Ant and they discover all the test
classes by themselves and sort out the details, so I'm not sure, whether
there is an easier way.

Greetings,
Malte
